mapper.insert: insert into core_sample_backup ( sample_id, sample_name, sample_type, number, long_number, double_number, big_decimal, local_date_time, local_date, local_time, lob_text, crypto_text ) values ( #{sampleId}, #{sampleName}, #{sampleType}, #{number}, #{longNumber}, #{doubleNumber}, #{bigDecimal}, #{localDateTime}, #{localDate}, #{localTime}, #{lobText}, #{cryptoText} )
